note.p: Birth: Shalford House, Guildford, Surrey, England (19 March 1808)
Death: Shalford House, Guildford, Surrey (25 November 1884)

Career: Fellow, Oriel College Oxford; knew Charles Lyell (FRS 1826), Leonard Horner (FRS 1813) and Sir Roderick Murchison (FRS 1826), and began to study geology; studied fossiliferous Devonian limestones
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1884-1885 vol 38 pp ix-xiii signed by J W J
Notes: DSB gives birth date as 17 Mar. Edward Forbes has signed election certificate twice
